= Principles =

1. Tests set tree view: examples are [https://docs.google.com/open?id=0B7H023IdhMTIMDc4MDgwYzAtNWE3Yy00MmFmLWE0OWUtNDlkYmIwOTgwNGYx here] these are MS Excel format of 2003
config.xls
	batch.xls
		suite1.xls
			test2.xls
				map_test2.xls
			test1.xls
			test3.xls
		suite2.xls
			test2.xls
			test1.xls
			test3.xls
		suite3.xls
			test2.xls
			test1.xls
			test3.xls

User can use Google.Docs to design test cases/suites via internet, then download them in to device(s) to test

2. Each time to run, system will run in order of batch.xls file, then order of suite.xls files, then order of test.xls files.

3. File called URL_BATCH.xls, this is importance and must have when, this must included in  ../DCIM/DFRS folder of external hard drive from phone device:
- you decide to run tests/suites, .XLS files, on device (by key "download" with value of "no"), or
- download .XLS files from external (by key "download" with value of "yes", and below to define files and INTERNET or external links to download)

4. File called CONFIG.xls, this is importance when you run tests/suites from, this must included in  ../DCIM/DFRS folder of external hard drive from phone device :
  * key "xls_writeto_url" with value of "output", definition of where you write the report after executing tests/suites
	example: 
		value of "output" -> test will  report after executing tests/suites to "output.xls" 
  * key "xls_batch_url" with value of "batch"
	example: 
		value of "batch" -> test will run batch.xls, then suite inside batch file, then tests on suite 

5. Design each test must be full of data on all cells or be lacking information
  * example a RIGHT test case:

Business logic: after opening the application, click button named YES, and enter email & password, then submit. Then verify name of "Dean" is appeared on screen

6. When running finished, output.xls or .html will be generated to be reported of runs, so all status/step which are used to design in test.xls files will be logged (pass/fail)

7. Tester will design steps like action, such as sendkey, searchtext, back ....on each test.xls 
examples are here
